data.name: ReadCaseRoleCase
data.value: select T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.TYPE, T1.CASE_ROLE_ID, T1.START_DATE, T1.END_DATE, T2.STATUS from CKT_CASE T2 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T1 on (T1.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T2.NUMB = T1.CAS_NUMBER) and (T1.TYPE in ('AP', 'AR')) and (T1.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T1.END_DATE > @startDate)

data.name: ReadEmployerIncomeSource
data.value: select top(1) T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.NAME, T2.IDENTIFIER, T2.TYPE, T2.CSP_I_NUMBER from CKT_EMPLOYER T1 join CKT_INCOME_SOURCE T2 on (T1.IDENTIFIER = T2.EMP_ID) and (T2.IDENTIFIER = @identifier)
